article.title: Northrop Grumman Names McMahon, Vice to New Posts
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Northrop Grumman, Bethpage, New York, has named Patricia McMahon sector vice president and general manager, aerospace systems battle management and engagement systems division. Northrop Grumman Corporation, Los Angeles, has elected Thomas E. Vice corporate vice president and president of its technical services sector.
